sentences.sContent: A megawatt is an instantaneous measure of power.
sentences.sContent_eng: A megawatt is an instantaneous measure of power.
sentences.sCn: 一兆瓦是电力的瞬间衡量指标。

sentences.sContent: As the renewable technologies continued to mature, the report added, the cost per megawatt (MW) continued to fall.
sentences.sContent_eng: As the renewable technologies continued to mature, the report added, the cost per megawatt (MW) continued to fall.
sentences.sCn: 报道又说，因为可再生能源技术不断走向成熟，每兆瓦（MW）的成本继续下跌。

sentences.sContent: Still, there is not a single megawatt of EGS-produced power on line yet, and, at best, it will be quite a while before it becomes a significant energy source.
sentences.sContent_eng: Still, there is not a single megawatt of EGS-produced power on line yet, and, at best, it will be quite a while before it becomes a significant energy source.
sentences.sCn: 不过，EGS还没能向电网输送哪怕是一兆瓦的电力，就是按最好情况算，它要成为主要的能源来源还很需要一些时日。
